SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
MINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS
Windows 2000/XP
MINIMUM
Intel Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD Athlon 1.8 GHz Processor
512 MB RAM
3 GB Hard Disk Space

8x DVD-ROM Drive
